Name: postcricoid region cancer
Definition: A vascular disease that is located_in a vein.

Name: aryepiglottic fold cancer
Definition: A carcinoma in situ that is characterized by the spread of cancer in the digestive organ and the lack of invasion of surrounding tissues.
Synonym: malignant tumor aryepiglottic fold - hypopharyngeal aspect

Name: obsolete nodular lymphoma involving intrapelvic lymph nodes
Definition: A carcinoma in situ that is characterized by the spread of cancer in the digestive organ and the lack of invasion of surrounding tissues.
Synonym: nodular lymphoma of intrapelvic lymph nodes (disorder)

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's sarcoma involving intra-abdominal lymph nodes
Definition: A carcinoma in situ that is characterized by the spread of cancer in the digestive organ and the lack of invasion of surrounding tissues.
Synonym: Hodgkin's sarcoma of intra-abdominal lymph nodes (disorder)

Name: pyriform sinus cancer
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the kidney.
